description: Try our easy to follow Cheesy Hot Dogs recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Cheesy Hot Dogs Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 750 ml Wine option: Cat Amongst the Pigeons Shiraz
750 ml Wine option: South Island Marlborough Sauvignon Blanc

recipeInstructions.text: Place hot dog rolls on a serving tray and fill each with a frankfurt and pickles. Drizzle with tomato sauce and mustard. Sprinkle over cheese and top with rocket. Serve with potato crisps.
Place hot dog rolls on a serving tray and fill each with a frankfurt and pickles. Drizzle with tomato sauce and mustard. Sprinkle over cheese and top with rocket. Serve with potato crisps.
